Authors:
Lynn Delgat, Eske De Crop, Annemieke Verbeken, Andrï¿½-Ledoux
Njouonkou
Title:
A new milkcap species discovered in the gallery forests of
West Cameroon: Lactifluus persicinus sp. nov. (Russulaceae)
Keywords:
Ectomycorrhizal fungi, tropical Africa, biodiversity,
edible mushroom, cryptic species
Abstract:
During field work in 2012 and 2014 in the Noun division of
western Cameroon, several collections of an unknown Lactifluus species
were discovered in gallery forest. Molecular and morphological research
shows that these collections represent a new Lactifluus species,
Lactifluus persicinus Delgat & De Crop sp. nov., which is described
in this paper. Lactifluus persicinus belongs to Lf. subg.
Pseudogymnocarpi, more specifically to Lf. sect. Xerampelini.
